name: Zookeeper World
summary: Zookeeper is a action-puzzle game where you need to get through a variety of puzzles and collect coins to fill your zoo with cute animals, plants and more. As you complete requests from these visitors as well as the Boss, your zoo rank will increase. Before long, you'll be expanding and customizing your zoo with various designs and decorations! With endless ways to spice things up, there’s never a dull moment as a zookeeper!
